fields.name: RCP45
fields.label: RCP 4.5
fields.description: Stabilization without overshoot pathway to 4.5 W/m2 at stabilization after 2100. See https://www.skepticalscience.com/rcp.php

fields.name: RCP85
fields.label: RCP 8.5
fields.description: Rising radiative forcing pathway leading to 8.5 W/m2 in 2100. See https://www.skepticalscience.com/rcp.php

fields.name: historical
fields.label: Historical
fields.description: A historical dataset from NEX GDDP for 1950 to 2005 that blends reanalysis data with observations
